doc.field: - Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 300,000 to 305,000 head versus 292,000 week ago and 316,000 a year ago. Saturday's hog slaughter is guesstimated at about 30,000 to 55,000 head. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 128,000 to 130,000 head versus 129,000 week ago and 119,000 a year ago. Saturday's cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 20,000 to 40,000 head.
